ygData.subject: Hysteria
ygData.msgSnippet: That s right, Hysteria.  It s awesome, not as good as Pyromania, but Deaf Leopard is still good. Just thought I d share that vital info. with everyone. - L.

That's right, Hysteria.  It's awesome, not as good as Pyromania, but Deaf 
Leopard is still good.

Just thought I'd share that vital info. with everyone.



- L. Unitron of the Decepticon Empire AKA The Gods of War
